Articles.Content:
Have you ever wanted to take a long distance roadtrip in an RV but been stopped by a pesky ocean or mountain range?

Have you ever desired to camp on another continent but dreaded the travel time

I now present to you,

* * *

**The Recreational Jumbo Jet!**

**Download Link:** 
[**http://www./download/17czysmmnrd5l8c/Recreational+Aircraft.zip**](http://www./download/17czysmmnrd5l8c/Recreational+Aircraft.zip)

* * *

This Craft is **Completely Stock**!

This jumbo jet features many of the things one would expect in a regular household or RV, except with wings! This deluxe aircraft features not only a completely pressurized (and currently IVA-free) crew cabin, with a capacity of 16 members, plus a 4-crewed cockpit! **(Pilots sold separately)**

Behind the pressurized crew cabin, there is a living space within a very large refurbished cargo bay! This living space consists of an upper and lower deck!

The upper deck contains a table and areas to lounge, along with an extendable deck (bay doors) and a pedway leading to the rear cupola module!

The lower deck connects via a stairwell, also leading to an ease-of-access landing can for ease of entry. The lower deck primarily consists of a home theater and a garage for an included rover to explore your environment! The garage includes a lower cargo bay door allowing the rover to exit the aircraft.

Now I am sure you are wondering about the stability and agility of the aircraft both parked and in flight. The aircraft is highly maneuverable in the air, and very stable on the ground, thanks to a system of deplorable stabilizing legs and gears. And worry not about speed: the aircraft consists of 6 engines capable of hauling you and your family/friends to any destination your heart desires in a short period of time!

A brand-new feature that we are proud to include is an interior cupola module, allowing one to enter and receive a breathtaking view of the landscape below, when the lower bay doors are open in flight! Similarly, there is a small lander can in the rear that offers an incredible view of the passing landscape.

* * *

Without further adieu, here are some pictures of this revolutionary craft:

Sitting on the runway, the rear viewing window is seen. Also, a view of her in flight:

![Z0A6T6Ml.png](http://i.imgur.com/Z0A6T6Ml.png)![RpQl1Rul.png](http://i.imgur.com/RpQl1Rul.png)

Shown below are interior views from the cupola module and the rear lander can:

![whHlLdcl.png](http://i.imgur.com/whHlLdcl.png)![lTGDvCSl.png](http://i.imgur.com/lTGDvCSl.png)

Now landed on the beach, shown is the upper deck:

![bYd1GEWl.png](http://i.imgur.com/bYd1GEWl.png)![SFZrA3Ul.png](http://i.imgur.com/SFZrA3Ul.png)![rVJ1s8pl.png](http://i.imgur.com/rVJ1s8pl.png)

Shown below is the lower deck theater:

![CBLATRZl.png](http://i.imgur.com/CBLATRZl.png)

Shown below is the garage and stability system. Also seen is the ramp used by the rover and a way for passengers to gain access:

![XA0Hz70l.png](http://i.imgur.com/XA0Hz70l.png)![82y3GuQl.png](http://i.imgur.com/82y3GuQl.png)![viSVm3pl.png](http://i.imgur.com/viSVm3pl.png)

Shown below is the rover, used to explore, or simply get away from the family once in a while ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

![BEvV3Pll.png](http://i.imgur.com/BEvV3Pll.png)![eD0mPjQl.png](http://i.imgur.com/eD0mPjQl.png)

* * *

Action Groups

1: Upper Deck Cargo Bay Doors

2: Lower Deck Cargo bay Doors

3: Stability Enhancing System (legs and gears)

4: Antennae and lounge chair umbrellas

5: Interior (fancy) lights

6: Cockpit Ladders

* * *

Warranty void if piloted by Jeb

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-11T02:02:28Z" title="03/11/2015 02:02  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 11, 2015</time> by SpenSpaceCorp**
